body_html:
I installed tensorflow in conda environment and it worked. Maybe you should give a try.

After installing anaconda make sure to set your path. Or else it would raise command error "conda: command not available"
body_text:

After installing anaconda make sure to set your path. Or else it would raise command error "conda: command not available"
body:
I installed tensorflow in conda environment and it worked. Maybe you should give a try. 

After installing anaconda make sure to set your path. Or else it would raise command error "conda: command not available"
